name: NIKHIL SREEJITH E

full_output.summary: Hello! I am Nikhil, a dedicated and passionate final-year student at Hindustan Institute of Technology, pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Throughout my academic journey, I have engaged in various capstone projects that allowed me to apply my theoretical knowledge to practical scenarios, solving complex problems and developing innovative solutions. I am enthusiastic about the future of AI and ML and am keen to connect with like-minded professionals to explore opportunities and contribute to cutting-edge advancements in technology.

education.school: Hindustan Institute of Technology and Science

experiences.description: Frontend Development: Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build interactive and user-friendly interfaces, ensuring seamless navigation and accessibility. Backend Development: Worked with frameworks like Node.js and Django to implement server-side logic, manage databases, and integrate APIs for robust backend functionality. Version Control and Collaboration: Leveraged Git for version control and collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to meet project milestones and deadlines. Testing and Optimization: Conducted thorough testing to identify and resolve bugs, ensuring optimal performance and reliability across different browsers and devices.
